result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sheila Ann Clark

10:39 AM  Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: K. Anderson, ADA: Erica Ellenwood, DF ATTY: Jeremiah James Harrelson, DF:  Sheila Ann Clark appeared. QUASH WARRANT. S/T - Deputy Mangine. Direct by ADA Ellenwood. Cross by Atty. Harrelson. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. State will file Information. ARGN: Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands. Waives reading. NG. Court sets PSC.  Adjourned: 10:51 AM. kma

10:34 AM  Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: K. Anderson, ADA:  Erica Ellenwood, DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson, DF:  Sheila Ann Clark did not appear. Set for PH. State requests warrant. Atty. Harrelson makes statement regarding DE's previous non-appearance. Court issues WARRANT - body only, adjoining states. Adjourned: 10:36 AM. kma
Preliminary hearing on June 1, 2022 at 10:30 am.

02:11 PM  Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Michael Joseph Becker    Becker DF ATTY: Kaitlin Dippolito with Travis Satorius for today    Sheila Ann Clark appeared. Court quashes stayed warrant. Court questions non-appearance. Defendant mixed up the time of the last hearing. Court sets Prelim with Commissioner Heckmann. Adjourned at 2:13 PM.  gll  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.addlTxt: Appointing Atty Harrelson. Filed by Atty Harrelson. arc
Pretrial assessment. arc
Status conference on April 19, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:   Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  Sheila Ann Clark appeared from jail via video. DE has a copy of complaint. Understands charges and penalties. Address and DOB confirmed. Atty Harrelson waives further reading. Waives speedy preliminary hearing. Qualifies for PD services. Court schedules a status to see if counsel has been appointed.  Status conference scheduled for April 19, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
